doc:
Dorothy Cumming https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dorothy_Cumming 0 Dorothy Cumming (12 April 1894 – 10 December 1983) was an actress of the silent film era. She appeared in 39 American, English, and Australian films between 1915 and 1929, notably appearing as the Virgin Mary in Cecil B. DeMille's 1927 film The King of Kings and the jealous wife in Lillian Gish's 1928 The Wind. She also appeared in stage productions in those same countries. Dorothy_Cumming ( 12_April_1894 – 10_December_1983 ) was an_actress of the_silent_film_era . She appeared in 39_American_,_English_,_and_Australian_films between 1915_and_1929 , notably appearing as the_Virgin_Mary in Cecil_B._DeMille 's 1927_film The_King of Kings and the_jealous_wife in Lillian_Gish 's_1928 The_Wind . She also appeared in stage_productions in those_same_countries .
